description:
When Danish health officials were criticized for not making face masks mandatory, they responded by saying there is little evidence they limit the spread of respiratory viruses. 

Holland also does not require face masks and says: “There is no evidence of a medical effect of wearing face masks.” 

In Sweden, where “COVID-19” deaths have slowed to a crawl, public-health officials say there is “no point” in requiring individuals to wear masks. 

[Both the US Surgeon General and the CDC have flip-flopped on this issue but keep returning to the ‘wear-the-mask’ position, perhaps as a psychological measure to convince the sleeping public that the pretended pandemic is real].

Article:

https://fee.org/articles/europes-top-health-officials-say-masks-arent-helpful-in-beating-covid-19/
